block.title: Configure DShield synchronization schedule
block.text: Specify when your local Splunk instance will pull All Sources IP data from DShield. Keep in mind that DShield updates this list once per day, at 4 AM UTC.

input.label: Specify the synchronization interval. For example: 10 5 * * * to synchronize data every day at 5:10 AM (your local time zone)
Define your SourceIP or network (CIDR supported)
